vulnerabilities.description: Missing headers: x-content-type-options, x-frame-options, x-xss-protection, content-security-policy, strict-transport-security
Endpoint http://localhost:9999/.env is accessible and may expose sensitive information
Endpoint http://localhost:9999/config.json is accessible and may expose sensitive information
Endpoint http://localhost:9999/admin is accessible and may expose sensitive information
Endpoint http://localhost:9999/debug is accessible and may expose sensitive information

recommendations.action: Implement missing security headers (CSP, X-Frame-Options, etc.)
Set up comprehensive production monitoring and alerting
Implement automated security and performance testing in CI/CD
